display_long_description:
Step into Cosmic Drift —a cosmic adventure where your focus and resilience will be tested to the limit.

As a cadet in an elite space force, you’re humanity’s last hope in securing vital resources for survival. Piloting a remote spacecraft using intuitive arm motions and reactive controls, you’ll face procedurally generated challenges that demand precision, quick reflexes, and a sharp mind. Every mission is a test, where failure means starting over and success means edging closer to mastering your role in the cosmos.

In Cosmic Drift VR , you’ll navigate perilous asteroid belts, align with wormholes to traverse treacherous cosmic pathways, and escape the shadow of impending eclipses—all while collecting rare materials critical to sustaining humanity. Each level ramps up the challenge, pushing your mental and physical limits. Time is your greatest adversary, and every moment requires focus, strategy, and control.

Key features include:

• Dynamic Wormhole Mechanics: Align perfectly to guide your ship through unstable wormholes, demanding precision and reflexes.

• Eclipse Survival: Can you complete your objectives before the darkness closes in?

Your AI companion, M.E.T.T will guide you through each challenge, helping you build resilience and adapt to tougher missions ahead. The Beta is just the beginning—prepare for harder levels, deeper mysteries, and the ultimate test of your focus in the full Cosmic Drift universe.

The cosmos is calling. Will you rise to meet its challenges?
